name: Tank Game (itch) (The Only Snowflake)
description:
This is a clone of a this game that I made in about 3 hours (so far). There is no menu, no options, no score, no pause, no power ups; pretty much nothing that is needed to make a decent game. It's a fun multiplayer game that you can play with your friends. You will get stuck in walls, you will die in ways you really shouldn't have, and you will get super frustrated.

I will update it with some updates eventually, but for now this is it. Have fun.
